text: Ossa cave describes a cave at Mount Ossa in Greece. According to reports, the cave contained inscriptions. ==Mentions== Cave of Ossa, is mentioned in the book De Mundo, on page 1. An archaeology expedition, reviewed in an article from 1909 discussed, A Cave of the Nymphs on Mount Ossa. The cave is mentioned in Stable Places and Changing Perceptions: Cave Archaeology in Greece (2013). ==References== Category:Caves of Greece Category:Greek mythology Category:Landforms of Larissa (regional unit) Category:Landforms of Thessaly
title: Ossa cave
